about_the_game:
Symphonic Rock Music pack is a collection of 16 pieces that will fit in any classic, modern or mixed JRPG styled project.

■ The pack includes BGM and ME files for every basic RPG Making purpose.

■ Song’s genre spaces from symphonic soundtrack to rock with also combinations of both.

■ Every BGM file loops seamlessly in RPG Maker MV and MZ: you just have to import the files into your project.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【BGM (14 files)】

• Main Theme
• Main City
• Battle
• Field
• Village
• Forest
• Boss
• Peaceful Town
• Arid Field
• Mini Game
• Special Battle
• Medium City
• Catch the Creature
• Final Boss


【ME (2 files)】

• Victory
• Final Victory

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
